    about

    research

    My research triangulates between neuroscience, applied mathematics and machine learning. Currently, I work as a research consultant at the Danish Research Centre for Magnetic Resonance & and senior data scientist at 2021.ai. You can find my writing here.

    Find my CV here.

    tmorville.github.io

    The intention of this website is a platform to share streamlined notes and code while playing a bit of research catch-up or just exploring interesting stuff. I am widely interested in implementation of deep learning, control theory, reinforcement learning, computational neuroscience and applied mathematics.

    This site is powered by Jekyll themed by Minimal Mistakes.
